title: Ryan Gosling cuts a casual figure in a white T-shirt and green bomber jacket as he stops for lunch
text:
His partner Eva Mendes recently admitted that parenting with him is 'beautiful and maddening' in an recent interview with Access Daily.

And Ryan Gosling got some time off daddy duty on Monday as he was seen grabbing a bite to eat alone at Little Dom's in the Los Feliz neighborhood of Los Angeles.

The 38-year-old heartthrob donned a forest green bomber jacket, white t-shirt and grey jeans for the outing.

Dapper: Ryan Gosling got some time off daddy duty on Monday as he was seen grabbing a bite to eat alone at Little Dom's in the Los Feliz neighborhood of Los Angeles

He accessorized with a navy cap and brown boots as well as a silver pendant necklace.

Gosling shares five-year-old Esmeralda and three-year-old Amada with Mendes, 45.

Mendes continued to access daily that parenting alongside Gosling is 'so hard, of course.'

Handsome: The 38-year-old heartthrob donned a forest green bomber jacket, white t-shirt and grey jeans for the outing

She added: 'But it’s like that feeling of … you end your day, you put them to bed and Ryan and I kind of look at each other like, "We did it, we did it. We came out relatively unscathed."'

Mendes continued: 'I’m so thankful I have the opportunity to be home with them.'

The brunette beauty went on to provide more detail about her kids, saying that 'right now, they have every bug. They just like a lot of arts and crafts, a lot of painting.'

Lovebirds: Gosling shares five-year-old Esmeralda and three-year-old Amada with Mendes, 45

'We have instruments around. They pick them up, and we can’t say they actually play anything, but it’s just a playful environment.'

Mendes and Gosling met on the set of their film The Place Beyond the Pines.

They have been together since 2011.
description: His partner Eva Mendes recently admitted that parenting with him is 'beautiful and maddening' in an recent interview with Access Daily.
